attributes.action: Implement immediate actions to stop the cost of living catastrophe
attributes.additional_details:
The cost of living has been a huge crisis for several months now and is just getting worse as the weeks go by, and is going to get so much worse due to the Ukrainian invasion. High levels of immediate government action is required now to avoid catastrophe. 

That's it. It's that simple. 

I call on the Government to avert this catastrophe.
attributes.background:
Implement immediate widespread policies:

Scrap national insurance rise due in April

Remove the 25% VAT on fuel for at least twelve months 

Immediately provide £3.6bn for insulation grants to all households, 

Immediately increase all benefits in line with inflation (8%)
